Yakuza 4 Remastered[Note 1] is a singleplayer third-person open world action game developed by Ryu Ga Gotoku Studio and published by Sega. It is part of the Yakuza (Like a Dragon) series.

The game, which was released on PlayStation 4 in 2019, is a remastered version of Yakuza 4, originally released on PlayStation 3 in 2010. It was ported to PC by QLOC and released on January 28, 2021.

One of the playable characters had to be recasted for the remastered version due to the controversy surrounding the actor who played the character in the original game[1], but the original model and voice performance can be restored via modding.

Transferring Microsoft Store saves to the Steam version[edit]

The Microsoft Store save game data location should contain folders which lead to files with hexadecimal names that are either 119KB or 128KB in size.

The 128KB file is the save\system.sys file in the Steam save game data location.

Each 119KB file is either a savegameX.sav or a savegameX.clr (created after beating the game) file in the Steam save game data location, where X is the index of the save, starting at 1.

Which Microsoft Store save is which index can be deduced using the "Date modified" property of the file and the in-game save date.

Transfer is done by copying files from the Microsoft Store location to the Steam location and renaming the copied files correctly.

Mods[edit]

Shin Ryu Mod Manager (SRMM)[edit]

Mod manager for PC versions of Yakuza (Ryu Ga Gotoku) series games.
Fully compatible with the Steam, GOG and Microsoft Store/Gamepass releases.

Yakuza 4 Restoration Patch[edit]

Restores licensed music that was cut from the western version of Yakuza 4, as well as higher quality videos from the PlayStation 3 version, uncensors certain lines of dialogue in a scene during the game's first chapter, and restores Masayoshi Tanimura's original appearance and Japanese voice.
Use Restoration Patch[4]
  1. Download Yakuza 4 Hiroki Narimiya Restoration Patch.
  2. Unpack the files from the archive into the <path-to-game> and overwrite when prompted.

Notes

Yakuza 4 Licensed Music and Uncensor Restoration Patch can be used as an alternative without the Masayoshi Tanimura's original appearance and Japanese voice.
Condensed Hiroki Narimiya Restoration Patch can be used to only restore the Masayoshi Tanimura's original appearance and Japanese voice.

Hiroki Narimiya Restoration QTE Fix[edit]

Fixes the improper restoration of the original Masayoshi Tanimura's voice lines during the QTE segments in the mod above.
